item.title: How do i change the value pvp item in my pvp shops ? .. i forgot it :S
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

You wanna know how to change the prcie of the pvp shop item?

If so, do this.

It’s in ShopAssistant.java, should look like this.

case 1040:
return 20;

case 1040 = case + item ID
return 1; = return + Price of it

In my case 1040 is a party hat and return 20 means it costs 20 PkP. So, for your item, just change the case 1040 to case and your item id. To change the price, change return 20 to return whatever like 5 or 100.

Hope it helps.

Read full topic
